name: Geisha
description:
This is one of my first databending gif and my very first glitch work getting really viral online. It was published in 2014 on Tumblr for the Dirty New Media microblog curated by Jon Cates, Shawne Michaelain Holloway and I, Dom Barra. 

The gif count to date 03/10/2021 33,229 notes since Nov 24th, 2016 on my Tumblr http://dombarra.tumblr.com On http://dirtynewmedia.tumblr.com (now offline) it reached +130.000.

The loop was glitched by altering the data in the stream of the .gif format. Then, it was processed through dithering.
